modName: Helen - Half Dragon Race RaceMenu Preset
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][size=3]A RaceMenu Preset for the amazing [/size][/font][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/72416/?][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][size=3]Half Dragon Race[/size][/font][/url][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][size=3] mod by [/size][/font][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/4891972/?][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][size=3]nt6486[/size][/font][/url][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][size=3].
Even though she might not be too lore-friendly, I still think she suits the game world just fine, I tried and combined many different mods to be able to get the desired look for her. I didn't want her too look too
cartoon-ish or anime-ish, but still wanted her to step out of the common look. 

Installation
Extract the file in data/skse/plugins/chargen/presets
Go into showracemenu
Select the one called "Helen.jslot" and hit enter.

[img]http://i68.tinypic.com/334uc6b.jpg[/img]
[/size][/font][/center]
[size=4]However if you want your character too look exactly like in the screenshots, you need the mods listed below :[/size]

[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?]RaceMenu[/url] by [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2950481/?]expired6978[/url]

[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2812/?]Better Females[/url] by [b][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2501668/?]BellaGail[/url]

[/b][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30411/?]Brows[/url] by [b][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/30027/?]Hvergelmir[/url][/b] 

[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/?]Caliente's Beautiful Bodies Edition -CBBE-[/url] by[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3330686/?] Caliente

[/url][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/62639/?]Empyrean Warpaints - Custom Series (female)[/url] by [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/18908914/?]Empyrean42[/url]

[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50032/?]KJ Tattoos - Overlay Plugins for RaceMenu[/url] by [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/4727757/?][b]Khajiitas[/b] [/url]

[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54118/?]The Neith Team Warpaints Set[/url] by [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/6415122]Elaneith[/url]

[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311/?]KS Hairdos - Renewal[/url] by [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/4559665/?]Kalilies[/url]

[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/75674/?]Lind's Human Eyes[/url] by [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/6129727/?]Lind001[/url]

[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49279/?]Northborn Scars[/url][b]  by [/b][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3394799/?]Northborn[/url]

[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/22701/?]Seductive Lips HD[/url][b]  by [/b][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3676578/?]EcthelionOtW[/url]

[color=#980000][size=4][b][u]Important [/u][/b][/size][/color]

[b]These are the basic requirements to make your character look like mine. Note that Half Dragon Race does not contain nude body textures, so I'm using [/b][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/63680/?]Born Dragon Skin[/url] by [b][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/14844589/?]ZwabberdieBo[/url]. But you will have to manually install Born Dragon Skin textures to your Half Dragon Race folder. And replace the default textures of Half Dragon Race. 


[img]http://i68.tinypic.com/2im40hl.jpg[/img]


[/b][size=4][b]Optional Mods to get the accessories in the screenshots :

[/b][/size][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/67309/?]Ks Jewelry[/url] by [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/1251063]Stealthic Khaos

[/url][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/1251063]Facial Piercings[/url] by [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2511667]regnbagar[/url]

[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58165/?]HDT Tails Wearable[/url] by [b][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/10836128]deadzone45[/url][/b] 


[size=3]Enjoy ''''[/size]
author: Happy561
